怎么解决

replies.author: Astronomer
replies.txt_content:
找到 Spigot.yml
打开，然后将  use_bungeecord 设置为 false 即可

Astronomer 发表于 2017-8-28 11:07
找到 Spigot.yml
打开，然后将  use_bungeecord 设置为 false 即可
没找到啊....................................

replies.txt_content:
1651230083 发表于 2017-8-28 11:28
没找到啊....................................
# This is the main configuration file for Spigot.

# Forums: http://www.spigotmc.org/

config-version: 11
settings:
  debug: false
  save-user-cache-on-stop-only: false

commands:

replies.author: Ling_Haner
replies.txt_content: 在服务器根目录里找到spigot.yml文件 然后找到里面的bungeecord: true改为bungeecord: false
